author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Place spinach,  stock, sweet potato and leeks in a saucepan. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for eight minutes. Place the cooked ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Stir in the double cream and serve in a large bowl.
ingredients: 2 handfuls spinach,  290ml/10fl oz/½ pint chicken stock (vegetarians may substitute with vegetable stock),  ½ sweet potato, cubed,  5 baby leeks, sliced,  15ml/½fl oz double cream
